title: Fund listing on nonkyc.io centralized exchange
description: BZE Alpha Team proposes to spend 4,000,000 BZE to list BZE on nonkyc.io exchange. The coins will be converted to USDT in a private sale and we will use 2500 USDT to pay for the listing and the rest to provide liquidity on their exchange and the market maker bot. The private sale is conducted by Faneatiku (Alpha Team) to private sellers willing to support and help BZE. This listing is required to meet Coingeko requirements to display our data correctly.
